summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 3 October to end of Sunday 3 October GMT
description: Our weather continues to be dominated by a slow moving Atlantic low pressure system located to the north of the UK. .<br/><br/>Sunday sees the 40th running of the London Marathon and it's forecast to be cloudy with sunny intervals throughout the day, intermittent showers are also forecast.<br/><br/>A fresh 'Atlantic' south-westerly airflow is expected to increase from late morning, easing again by evening. These condition will ensure good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
